name: Broadway Florist
description: A delightful explosion of color and fragrance, the Broadway Florist is a feast for the senses. Sunlight streams through the large front window, illuminating buckets of fresh-cut roses, tulips, and daisies. The air is sweet with the scent of blossoms and damp earth. A cheerful woman in a floral apron hums a popular tune as she arranges a bouquet, her hands moving with practiced grace. This is where you come to celebrate life's special moments, one beautiful bloom at a time.
